text: Telefe Tucumán was a television station broadcasting on analog channel 8 in San Miguel de Tucumán, the capital of the Argentine province of Tucumán. It was an owned-and-operated station of the Telefe television network. On January 31, 2023, the sale of the channel to Grupo Televisión Litoral, owner of channels 3 in Rosario and 6 in Bariloche, became official, for which the channel once again adopted the name of Channel 8, becoming an affiliate of Telefe. The original network closed on February 1, 2023. Category:Tucumán Province Category:Telefe
title: Telefe Tucumán
